message:
ARVADA, Colo. -- An 11-year-old Arvada boy was arrested and hauled away in handcuffs for drawing stick figures in school, something his therapist told him to do.

‎"'Tim' is being treated for ADD & his therapist told him to draw pictures when he got upset, rather than disrupt the class. So that’s what he did.... He felt calmer & was throwing the picture away when the teacher saw it... The school was aware that the boy was in treatment... & sent him back to class. His mother... was shocked when Arvada Police showed up at their home later that night."
